title: Anderson 175A Power Connector
blurb:
Used widely in both domestic and industry, you'll find this connector in many 4WD applications, boating, automotive and other industries.  Supplied individually with a pair of contacts.
Contact Wire Size: 53.5mm
(1/0 AWG)
Max Wire Insulation Diameter: 19mm
Contact Retention Force: 137kg (300lbs)
Operating Temperature: -20 to +125 degrees C
